podcast_details.podcast_name: Almost Married: Everything You Need to Know to Plan Your Dream Wedding
podcast_details.description: Planning the biggest and most important day of your life can be daunting to say the least. How do you choose the perfect dress that will look timeless in your photos for all the years to come? How much should you spend on a caterer? Do you need to have an open bar? Where do you even start with figuring out seating arrangements and table settings? Whether you are doing everything yourself, or are fortunate to have a planner help along the way, this podcast is for you. Almost Married is hosted by highly sought-after wedding planner Aly Armstrong who will walk you through everything you need to know before you say 'I do'. Each week, Aly will have a new wedding industry guest on her show to give you the best insight on all the tips, tricks, and trends so you can have the wedding of your dreams.
podcast_details.artist_name: Almost Married: Everything You Need to Know to Plan Your Dream Wedding

podcast_details.description: This is the Design and Innovation Podcast or DIP as we like to call it. Here we break down what design is and its relevance to businesses. Through this podcast, we aim to bring to the forefront the power of design as it relates to business. We release new episodes bi-monthly. so be sure to check out our new episodes. Visit our website https://designandinnovation.dodo.ng or write to us dip@dodo.ng

Diseño Humano es un podcast sobre crear, diseñar, imaginar y todas aquellas acciones que nos definen como humanos. 



Hablaremos de diseño en sus diferentes vertientes: de interacción, de experiencia de usuario (UX), diseño de servicios (service design), design thinking, internet of things, diseño de marcas, veremos en qué consisten… y nos centraremos especialmente en la parte de HUMANOS: Los mal llamados usuarios, clientes, consumidores, tienen un espacio aquí para ser considerados seres humanos. Animales que se mueves por gustos y por instintos.



Mi nombre es Juan Perucho. Soy diseñador de interacción, mentor y consultor y te invito a que participes en ésta aventura

podcast_details.podcast_name: Power of Ten with Andy Polaine
podcast_details.description: Design operates at many levels, from thoughtful detail through organisational transformation to the changes in society and the world. As the famous Ray and Charles Eames Powers of Ten film showed, each power of ten zoom level on the world contains its own complexity, ecosystem and details, but they are all interrelated. In the Power of Ten podcast, Andy Polaine talks to guests from a broad range of disciplines about the intersection of design, technology, psychology, organisations, culture and society.

podcast_details.description: Did you know that being healthy includes more than diet and exercise? Now more than ever health conscious families are realizing that the home environment plays an integral part to our overall wellness. This podcast is dedicated towards uncovering all the different aspects that lead to a healthy home environment. Sheila Alston is a Realtor® and Designer who is passionate about healthy living and beautiful design. She interviews industry experts to bring awareness on how you can easily create a more healthy home environment enabling you and your family to Bloom and Grow!

podcast_details.podcast_name: Art Insiders New York Podcast hosted by Anders Holst
podcast_details.description: Art Insiders New York podcast offers behind-the-scenes conversations with fascinating people who are making an impact in the world of art, architecture & design in New York. The podcast is hosted by Anders Holst.

Creative entrepreneur, Jess Kovic shares intimate confessions about her real real life struggle and success as an artist putting her work out into the world. Opening yourself up to display your passion is scary and can hold even the most talented artists back. We’re a fragile bunch. Get the dish on exhibiting, vendors, money talk and embarrassing tales of a creative in business. We’re name dropping here people. This podcast reveals all of her tips and tricks while figuring them out in real time so you don’t have to. In a world of Instagram highlights, many creatives share only the polished final products but rarely the hard lessons learned to get there either out of perfectionism OR fear of competition. But there’s enough room for all of us to fail forward together!

The Profitable Designer Show is the best show in the industry for design businesses to learn about building offers, traffic, marketing, sales, and ultimate business mastery. Patrick O'Connell is the founder of the Design Authority™ Coaching & Implementation Program, a global movement of designers who are turning their expertise and skillset into it's most profitable & long-term business model.
Stephanie Sullivan and Dina Carole share their stories, DIY and faith in this weekly podcast.

Candid commentary on various interior design subjects and topics including the good, the bad, and the ugly. Telling you like it really is! Giving you the whole truth and nothing but the truth, so you don’t have to hope you are lucky in any type of interior design situation. Steve is dedicated to giving you a healthy dose of Interior Design Commentary, Critique, Interpretation, and Analysis. The “Interior Design Beat” is the heartbeat of interior design podcasts!
